[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Flyout](./blockly.flyout_class.md) &gt; [createDom](./blockly.flyout_class.createdom_1_method.md)

## Flyout.createDom() method

Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own SVG element or be a g element nested inside a separate SVG element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createDom(tagName: string | Svg<SVGSVGElement> | Svg<SVGGElement>): SVGElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tagName | string \| [Svg](./blockly.utils_namespace.svg_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;SVGSVGElement&gt; \| [Svg](./blockly.utils_namespace.svg_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;SVGGElement&gt; | The type of tag to put the flyout in. This should be <svg> or <g>. |

**Returns:**

SVGElement

The flyout's SVG group.
